body_html:
when i add the host to my host file, i can get response when i ping www.tensorflow.org.
However, i still fail to access the web via browser.

PING www.tensorflow.org (64.233.188.121): 56 data bytes
64 bytes from 64.233.188.121: icmp_seq=0 ttl=245 time=194.245 ms
64 bytes from 64.233.188.121: icmp_seq=1 ttl=245 time=198.178 ms

However, i still fail to access the web via browser.

body:
when i add the host to my host file, i can get response when i ping www.tensorflow.org.
However, i still fail to access the web via browser.

```
PING www.tensorflow.org (64.233.188.121): 56 data bytes
64 bytes from 64.233.188.121: icmp_seq=0 ttl=245 time=194.245 ms
64 bytes from 64.233.188.121: icmp_seq=1 ttl=245 time=198.178 ms
```
